author: Joshua Gouge
comment: I have one problem with this otherwise great app: even if I shut it down completely, it starts out of the blue after I get a text msg or call. It can be very unsettling late at night to have an app blast music just because I get a message. Great selection of stations. Very few, if any, dead links.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
This is not a common behavior of our application.
Please be sure if you are killing the app in the background.
Give us some feedback about it to - info@appgeneration.com
Best,
Support team

author: Bill Mead
comment: Selecting a country is not working. Pressing the three dots in the upper right hand corner does nothing to help this.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Thanks for your feedback.
We have tested and the country selection is working without any problem.
As well as the full list of radios.
Send us an email to help@mytuner.mobi so we can help you better.
Best,
Support team

author: Julie Zei
comment: No matter if I'm on Wi-Fi, or 4G the station always stops playing. Not to buffer or load, just stops. Can't figure out why as it happens for all stations I listen to.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Please make sure you're not using a memory saving app / task killer app in the background (sometimes the manufacture of the phone add them to save power and don't allow apps to perform in background mode).
Best,
myTuner Team

comment: Annoying as this app plays audio adds and stomps all over any radio station you may be listening to. Avoid it at all costs. Makers say it is the broadcast station  adverts? So not true

author: M Khanfar
comment: Please fix cellular network issue !! All stations stop work after 5 minutes when screen off in cellular network connection !!! In WiFi connection its OK ! Please  fix this issue in next update !! And I put the app in not optimize battery list ... I allow the app to work in background but same issue happened !!! My phone nexus5 Android 7.1 and nexus 9 android 7.2 the same issue ... Please fix !!!!!!

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Please make sure you're not using a memory saving app / task killer app in the background (sometimes the manufacture of the phone add them to save power and don't allow apps to perform in background mode).
Best,
myTuner Team

author: Philip Storrow
comment: I purchased the pro and I still get audio adverts overlaid by the app. If I take a Bluetooth call in the car, I get an advert once the call ends.

reply.author: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
reply.content:
Dear user,
Can you tell us the names of the stations?
Probably the ads you are receiving are from the radio's broadcast and we can't remove them.
Send us an email with all details to help@mytuner.mobi
Best,
Support team

comment: I pay for the pro version and is unusable with android auto. I need to use the free one with payed for remove comercials. So I expect from vendor to fix issue or retun the money.

comment: Please terminate the stream when I exit the App. I can't tell you how many times I have found the radio station still playing quietly hours later eating up my data.

author: Christian Bannard
comment: Fantastic app. Love it. Very useful for jogging and when traveling the World. Can listen to local and your own country's radio from anywhere. Love it guys!!

author: Alby L
comment: Great radio app I have no problems getting any station I need and I'm very happy with it I highly recommend it. 👍
